ayah: وَقَالُواْ قُلُوبُنَا فِيٓ أَكِنَّةٖ مِّمَّا تَدۡعُونَآ إِلَيۡهِ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِنَا وَقۡرٞ وَمِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا وَبَيۡنِكَ حِجَابٞ فَٱعۡمَلۡ إِنَّنَا عَٰمِلُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu qulubuna fi akinnatin mimma tad'una ilayhi wafi adhanina waqrun wamin baynina wabaynika hijabun fa-i'mal innana amiluna
ayah_english: And they say Our hearts (are) in coverings from what you call us to it and in our ears (is) deafness and between us and between us and between you (is) a screen So work indeed, we (are) working

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ فَٱسۡتَقِيمُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوهُۗ وَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
ayah_translit: qul innama ana basharun mith'lukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fa-is'taqimu ilayhi wa-is'taghfiruhu wawaylun lil'mush'rikina
ayah_english: Say Only I am a man like you it is revealed to me that your god (is) God One so take a Straight Path to Him and ask His forgiveness And woe to the polytheists

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ فَٱسۡتَقِيمُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوهُۗ وَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

ayah_english: Say Only I am a man like you it is revealed to me that your god (is) God One so take a Straight Path to Him and ask His forgiveness And woe to the polytheists

ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnunin

ayah: ۞قُلۡ أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَتَجۡعَلُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: qul a-innakum latakfuruna bi-alladhi khalaqa al-arda fi yawmayni wataj'aluna lahu andadan dhalika rabbu al-'alamina
ayah_english: Say Do you indeed [surely] disbelieve in the One Who created the earth in two periods and you set up with Him rivals That (is the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: ۞قُلۡ أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَتَجۡعَلُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah_english: Say Do you indeed [surely] disbelieve in the One Who created the earth in two periods and you set up with Him rivals That (is the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَهِيَ دُخَانٞ فَقَالَ لَهَا وَلِلۡأَرۡضِ ٱئۡتِيَا طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡهٗا قَالَتَآ أَتَيۡنَا طَآئِعِينَ
ayah_translit: thumma is'tawa ila al-samai wahiya dukhanun faqala laha walil'ardi i'tiya taw'an aw karhan qalata atayna tai'ina
ayah_english: Then He directed (Himself) towards the heaven while it (was) smoke and He said to it and to the earth Come both of you willingly or unwillingly They both said We come willingly

ayah: فَإِنۡ أَعۡرَضُواْ فَقُلۡ أَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ صَٰعِقَةٗ مِّثۡلَ صَٰعِقَةِ عَادٖ وَثَمُودَ
ayah_translit: fa-in a'radu faqul andhartukum sa'iqatan mith'la sa'iqati adin wathamuda
ayah_english: But if they turn away then say I have warned you (of) a thunderbolt like (the) thunderbolt (of) Aad and Thamud

ayah: إِذۡ جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلرُّسُلُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ قَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّنَا لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗ فَإِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: idh jaathumu al-rusulu min bayni aydihim wamin khalfihim alla ta'budu illa al-laha qalu law shaa rabbuna la-anzala malaikatan fa-inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
ayah_english: When came to them the Messengers from before them from before them from before them and from behind them (saying) Do not worship but Allah They said If (had) willed our Lord surely, He (would have) sent down Angels So indeed, we in what you have been sent with (are) disbelievers

ayah: فَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَقَالُواْ مَنۡ أَشَدُّ مِنَّا قُوَّةًۖ أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَهُمۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗۖ وَكَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَجۡحَدُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-amma adun fa-is'takbaru fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi waqalu man ashaddu minna quwwatan awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhi khalaqahum huwa ashaddu min'hum quwwatan wakanu biayatina yajhaduna
ayah_english: Then as for Aad they were arrogant in the earth without [the] right and they said Who (is) mightier than us (in) strength Do not they see that Allah the One Who created them He (is) Mightier than them (in) strength But they used (to) in Our Signs deny

ayah: فَإِن يَصۡبِرُواْ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَسۡتَعۡتِبُواْ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُعۡتَبِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-in yasbiru fal-naru mathwan lahum wa-in yasta'tibu fama hum mina al-mu'tabina
ayah_english: Then if they endure the Fire (is) an abode for them and if they ask for favor then not they (will be) of those who receive favor

ayah: ۞وَقَيَّضۡنَا لَهُمۡ قُرَنَآءَ فَزَيَّنُواْ لَهُم مَّا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ
ayah_translit: waqayyadna lahum quranaa fazayyanu lahum ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wahaqqa alayhimu al-qawlu fi umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina al-jini wal-insi innahum kanu khasirina
ayah_english: And We have destined for them companions (who) made fair-seeming to them what (was) before them (was) before them and what (was) behind them and (is) justified against them the Word among nations (that have) passed away (that have) passed away before them before them of the jinn and the men Indeed, they were losers

ayah_english: That (is the) recompense (of the) enemies (of) Allah the Fire for them therein (is the) home (of) the eternity (as) recompense for what they used (to) of Our Verses reject

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ نَجۡعَلۡهُمَا تَحۡتَ أَقۡدَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru rabbana arina alladhayni adallana mina al-jini wal-insi naj'alhuma tahta aqdamina liyakuna mina al-asfalina
ayah_english: And (will) say those who disbelieve Our Lord! Show us those who misled us of the jinn and the men (so) we may put them under our feet that they be of the lowest

ayah_translit: inna alladhina qalu rabbuna al-lahu thumma is'taqamu tatanazzalu alayhimu al-malaikatu alla takhafu wala tahzanu wa-abshiru bil-janati allati kuntum tu'aduna

ayah_english: We (are) your protectors in the life (of) the world and in the Hereafter And for you therein whatever desire your souls and for you therein what you ask

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: waman ahsanu qawlan mimman da'a ila al-lahi wa'amila salihan waqala innani mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: And who (is) better (in) speech than (one) who invites to Allah and does righteous (deeds) and says Indeed I am of those who submit

ayah: وَلَا تَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡحَسَنَةُ وَلَا ٱلسَّيِّئَةُۚ ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ فَإِذَا ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَهُۥ عَدَٰوَةٞ كَأَنَّهُۥ وَلِيٌّ حَمِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wala tastawi al-hasanatu wala al-sayi-atu id'fa' bi-allati hiya ahsanu fa-idha alladhi baynaka wabaynahu adawatun ka-annahu waliyyun hamimun
ayah_english: And not are equal the good (deed) and the evil (deed) Repel by (that) which [it] (is) better then behold! One who between you and between him (was) enmity as if he (was) a friend intimate

ayah_translit: wa-imma yanzaghannaka mina al-shaytani nazghun fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi innahu huwa al-sami'u al-'alimu

ayah: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنَّكَ تَرَى ٱلۡأَرۡضَ خَٰشِعَةٗ فَإِذَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا ٱلۡمَآءَ ٱهۡتَزَّتۡ وَرَبَتۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡيَاهَا لَمُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
ayah_translit: wamin ayatihi annaka tara al-arda khashi'atan fa-idha anzalna alayha al-maa ih'tazzat warabat inna alladhi ahyaha lamuh'yi al-mawta innahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that you see the earth barren but when We send down upon it water it is stirred (to life) and grows Indeed the One Who gives it life (is) surely the Giver of life (to) the dead Indeed He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah_english: And among His Signs (is) that you see the earth barren but when We send down upon it water it is stirred (to life) and grows Indeed the One Who gives it life (is) surely the Giver of life (to) the dead Indeed He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلۡحِدُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَا يَخۡفَوۡنَ عَلَيۡنَآۗ أَفَمَن يُلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَيۡرٌ أَم مَّن يَأۡتِيٓ ءَامِنٗا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ ٱعۡمَلُواْ مَا شِئۡتُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina yul'hiduna fi ayatina la yakhfawna alayna afaman yul'qa fi al-nari khayrun am man yati aminan yawma al-qiyamati i'malu ma shi'tum innahu bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: Indeed those who distort [in] Our Verses (are) not hidden from Us So is (he) who is cast in the Fire better or (he) who comes secure (on the) Day (of) Resurrection Do what you will Indeed He of what you do (is) All-Seer

ayah_translit: walaw ja'alnahu qur'anan a'jamiyyan laqalu lawla fussilat ayatuhu a'jamiyyun wa'arabiyyun qul huwa lilladhina amanu hudan washifaon wa-alladhina la yu'minuna fi adhanihim waqrun wahuwa alayhim aman ulaika yunadawna min makanin ba'idin
ayah_english: And if We (had) made it a Quran (in) a foreign (language) they (would have) said Why not are explained in detail its verses (Is it) a foreign (language) and an Arab Say It (is) for those who believe a guidance and a healing And those who (do) not believe in their ears (is) deafness and it (is) for them blindness Those are being called from a place far

ayah: مَّنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيۡهَاۗ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِظَلَّـٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
ayah_translit: man amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha wama rabbuka bizallamin lil'abidi
ayah_english: Whoever does righteous deeds then it is for his soul and whoever does evil then it is against it And not (is) your Lord unjust to His slaves

ayah: ۞إِلَيۡهِ يُرَدُّ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِۚ وَمَا تَخۡرُجُ مِن ثَمَرَٰتٖ مِّنۡ أَكۡمَامِهَا وَمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِهِۦۚ وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِي قَالُوٓاْ ءَاذَنَّـٰكَ مَا مِنَّا مِن شَهِيدٖ
ayah_translit: ilayhi yuraddu il'mu al-sa'ati wama takhruju min thamaratin min akmamiha wama tahmilu min untha wala tada'u illa bi'il'mihi wayawma yunadihim ayna shurakai qalu adhannaka ma minna min shahidin
ayah_english: To Him is referred (the) knowledge (of) the Hour And not comes out any fruits from their coverings and not bears any female and not gives birth except with His knowledge And (the) Day He will call them Where (are) My partners They will say We announce (to) You not among us any witness

ayah: وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَدۡعُونَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَظَنُّواْ مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ
ayah_translit: wadalla anhum ma kanu yad'una min qablu wazannu ma lahum min mahisin
ayah_english: And lost from them what they were invoking before before and they (will) be certain (that) not for them any place of escape

ayah: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ
ayah_translit: la yasamu al-insanu min du'ai al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayausun qanutun
ayah_english: (Does) not get tired man of praying (for) the good but if touches him the evil then he gives up hope (and) despairs

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَٰهُ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ هَٰذَا لِي وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةٗ وَلَئِن رُّجِعۡتُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّيٓ إِنَّ لِي عِندَهُۥ لَلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ فَلَنُنَبِّئَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنۡ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٖ
ayah_translit: wala-in adhaqnahu rahmatan minna min ba'di darraa massathu layaqulanna hadha li wama azunnu al-sa'ata qaimatan wala-in ruji'tu ila rabbi inna li indahu lalhus'na falanunabbi-anna alladhina kafaru bima amilu walanudhiqannahum min adhabin ghalizin
ayah_english: And verily, if We let him taste mercy from Us after after an adversity (has) touched him he will surely say This (is) (due) to me and not I think the Hour (will be) established and if I am returned to my Lord indeed for me with Him (will be) the best But We will surely inform those who disbelieved about what they did and We will surely make them taste of a punishment severe

ayah: سَنُرِيهِمۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا فِي ٱلۡأٓفَاقِ وَفِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَهُمۡ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
ayah_translit: sanurihim ayatina fi al-afaqi wafi anfusihim hatta yatabayyana lahum annahu al-haqu awalam yakfi birabbika annahu ala kulli shayin shahidun
ayah_english: Soon We will show them Our Signs in the horizons and in themselves until becomes clear to them that it (is) the truth Is (it) not sufficient concerning your Lord that He (is) over all things a Witness

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطُۢ
